attributes.action: UK must not exit the EU without the consent of all 4 nations that make up the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The majority of people in Scotland and Northern Ireland voted to remain in the EU, while the people in Wales and England voted by a slim majority to leave the EU. 
This is too momentous a decision to be taken without all the countries that comprise the UK agreeing to leave.
attributes.background: We are on the cusp of not only leaving the EU by a fairly narrow majority, but we are also about to destroy a union of countries on these islands that has been a successful family of small nations for over 3 centuries.
